 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮

 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺

 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁

 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲

 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁
 





 How signals, data, and events enter the system safely.
 




  






 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲
 





 What work happens deterministically without humans.
 




  






 𝗢𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲
 





 How decisions are sequenced, governed, and escalated.
 




  






 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁
 





 How outcomes are delivered, explained, and consumed.
 




  






 Every role participates in one or more 𝗿𝘂𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀.

 Some operate within them.

 𝗔𝗜, 𝗜𝗻 𝗕𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗻

 But AI never owns outcomes.
 




  






 Humans review.
 





 Humans decide.
 





 Humans are accountable.
 




  






 That’s intentional.

 Shipping is expected.
 





 Shipping safely is designed.
 




  






 𝗛𝘂𝗺𝗮𝗻\\-𝗶𝗻\\-𝘁𝗵𝗲\\-𝗟𝗼𝗼𝗽 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆
 





 This matters enough to say explicitly.
 




  






 In every role:
 





 • AI may assist
 





 • automation may execute
 





 • pipelines may deploy
 




  






 But a human is always responsible for:
 





 • approving changes
 





 • stopping unsafe behavior
 





 • owning consequences
 




  






 We design systems where judgment is not optional.
